last_episode_to_air.name: I'm Pooped...
last_episode_to_air.overview: Gudetama and Shakipiyo finally make it to the chicken coop but must now try to pick their mother out of the flock.

name: Gudetama: An Eggcellent Adventure
original_name: ぐでたま 〜母をたずねてどんくらい〜
overview: Gudetama is an egg that lives in the refrigerator of a small restaurant. Actually, he has already finished with his life, as he knows that as an egg, no other fate can befall him than to be eaten. However, he did not reckon with the overzealous chick Shakipiyo! Shakipiyo persuades Gudetama to go on an adventure with him so that they can both find their mother. Even though there are thousands of dangers lurking in the world outside the fridge for the egg and the chick, they decide to break out…

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Determined to find their mother, the optimistic Shakipiyo believes that anything is possible with hope, grit and friendship — even for the laziest egg.

episodes.name: What a Drag…
episodes.overview: Gudetama meets Shakipiyo, who has big dreams of meeting their mother — but the lazy egg could care less.

episodes.name: So Dizzy
episodes.overview: The duo find themselves in the middle of a bustling, chaotic kitchen. Gudetama accidentally gets separated from Shakipiyo.

episodes.name: Is That the Best This Country Has to Offer?
episodes.overview: Gudetama and Shakipiyo find themselves in the office of the Prime Minister, who receives inspiration from an unlikely aid.

episodes.name: Ahhhh
episodes.overview: As Gudetama falls from the sky, Shakipiyo comes to the rescue — will the determined chick make it in time?

episodes.name: You’re Rotten to the Core
episodes.overview: Gudetama and Shakipiyo continue searching for their mother, but to no avail. One bright sunny day, they bump into a rotten egg.

episodes.name: What a Cool Mascot
episodes.overview: In order to prevent Gudetama from rotting, Shakipiyo tries to mix with a dangerous crowd. But a hard-boiled stranger advises against it.

episodes.name: How Many Eggs are in that Omelet?
episodes.overview: Completely trapped with no way out, Gudetama, Shakipiyo and Hard-boiled make a deal with the Boss Omelet.

episodes.name: Give Up Already
episodes.overview: Separated once again, Gudetama gets taken to a local TV station where Director Inoue desperately tries to come up with a scoop.

episodes.name: We Wanna See Our Mom
episodes.overview: After Director Inoue drops them off at the restaurant, Gudetama has a change of heart, which deeply touches Shakipiyo.

episodes.name: I'm Pooped...
episodes.overview: Gudetama and Shakipiyo finally make it to the chicken coop but must now try to pick their mother out of the flock.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Determined to find their mother, the optimistic Shakipiyo believes that anything is possible with hope, grit and friendship — even for the laziest egg.
